main event: A male civilian in Sun Valley, California, reported seeing a cigar-shaped object moving in a straight line during winter 1948.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6 or 7 seconds.,The object was cigar-shaped and moved in a straight line., The report indicates a potential link to the United States Air Force's Project Saucer., The civilian noticed the object did not resemble a meteor or star.,The observer described the object as having blue-green and white patterns of exhaust.
